{{Actor| | type = Light source | name = Alien floor bubble | class = AlienFloorBubble | game = Strife | doomednum = 222 | convid = 291 }}[[Classes]]: AlienFloorBubble
An alien chunk of bubbles which emit an ambient sound. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR AlienFloorBubble { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 72 +{{Flag|SOLID}} {{Property|ActiveSound}} "ambient/alien6" States { Spawn: BUBF A 4 [[A_LoopActiveSound]] Loop } }
